column12:
'desc': [u'

Tollyjoy Baby Lotion (250 ml) Price: Rs.199

Baby’s skin is very delicate and needs exceptional care to be kept moisturized and supple. The Tollyjoy Baby Lotion is formulated to keep your infant’s skin hydrated and soft. Since the little ones have delicate skin that is prone to dryness as they are frequently washed during nappy changes and frequent feeding. So you will have to replete your bundle of joy's skin with abundant moistness to keep the skin properly hydrated and free of irritations. The Tollyjoy Baby Lotion is infused with mineral oil that will keep your baby’s skin nourished and conditioned all day through. Use it daily after bathing your child and patting dry her skin of any excess water.

']

column12:
'desc': [u'

Tollyjoy Washable Nursing Pads (2 Pieces) Price: Rs.155

Nursing moms often have to deal with unexpected let-down of breastmilk that can cause soiling of clothes and can also cause the collection of infection causing bacteria. Nursing mothers must ensure that they maintain proper hygiene so as not to cause their babies to get sick. The 2-piece Tollyjoy Washable Nursing Pads offer a simple and hygienic solution for unexpected let-down.

These reusable Tollyjoy nursing pads offer three layered protection against leaking breast milk. the first layer that faces the brassiere is made of cotton fleece; the second layer is made from highly absorbent synthetic fibre and have a PVC lining that together collect any leaking breast milk and keeps the breast dry and clean; the third layer is a smooth woven surface that faces the breast. The washable nursing pads from Tollyjoy fit comfortably into your brassiere and three layered protection ensures that you never have to worry about unexpected let-down
column13:
whether you are at home or on the go.

\n
\n ']

column12:
'desc': [u'

Tollyjoy Manual Breast Pump with Feeding Bottle Set - Manual (Blue) Price: Rs.789

Constant breastfeeding can cause your nipples to hurt and can even cause your nipples to become dry and cracked. In these situations breast pump can be a very useful device for nursing mothers to own. The breast pump allows you to express and store breast milk and feed it to your baby as and when required. The breast pump also comes handy for working mothers who do not always have the luxury of being able to breastfeed their babies. But nursing mothers must always be sure that they purchase safe and hygienic breast pump that encourage natural let-down. The Tollyjoy Manual Breast Pump with Feeding Bottle Set is one such breast pump that offers safety
column13:
hygiene and ensures pain-free expression of breast milk.

\r\n

\r\n\tThe Tollyjoy Manual Breast Pump has a simple lever design that allows you to use the pump with a single hand. Expressed breast milk can be stored in the accompanying feeding bottle that can be used for instant feeding by attaching the silicone nipple. The light and portable Tollyjoy breast pump has a bottle holding base that prevents toppling and with the bottle cover
column14:
you can store breast milk for later usage. The Tollyjoy Manual breast pump is an easy-to-use breast pump that makes the lives of new moms much easier and makes breastfeeding a true joy.

\n
\n ']

column12:
'desc': [u'

Tollyjoy Battery Operated Breast Pump - Battery Operated Price: Rs.3399

New mothers may not always be able to breastfeed their babies for a variety of reasons. While some moms have to go to work
column13: others may have issues with engorgement that makes breastfeeding painful. But new moms do not have to depend on baby formula and can still nourish their babies with their own breast milk. The Tolljoy Battery Operated Breast Pump offers a simple solution by allowing you to express breast milk with ease. Expressing breast milk allows you to store breast milk which can be bottle fed to your baby even when you are not there. It also allows you to feed your baby
column14:
pain-free.

\r\n

\r\n\tThe Tolljoy electric breast pump is lightweight and easy to use and can be used with a single hand. The pump has a soft silicone funnel adaptor and when the pump is switched on it replicates your baby\u2019s suckling action that encourages natural let-down and helps you express breast milk quickly and effortlessly. The pump has a light on/off indicator that lets you know that the pump is functioning. A convenient feature that this electric breast pump offers is that it can be used on batteries or on AC/DC power. For improved hygiene
column15:
the pump comes with a water cleaning tube that allows you to thoroughly clean the pump and prevent milk remnants from collecting in the pump.

\r\n

\r\n\tThe Tolljoy electric breast pump can be used discreetly and allows you express
column16:
store and feed breast milk to your baby with ease. The pump is a useful device for any new mom to own.

\n
\n ']
